UPDATE AC_APP
guid = #{guid,jdbcType=varchar},
app_code = #{app_code,jdbcType=varchar},
app_name = #{app_name,jdbcType=varchar},
app_type = #{app_type,jdbcType=varchar},
isopen = #{isopen,jdbcType=char},
open_date = #{open_date,jdbcType=date},
url = #{url,jdbcType=varchar},
app_desc = #{app_desc,jdbcType=varchar},
guid_emp_maintenance = #{guid_emp_maintenance,jdbcType=varchar},
guid_role_maintenance = #{guid_role_maintenance,jdbcType=varchar},
remark = #{remark,jdbcType=varchar},
iniwp = #{iniwp,jdbcType=char},
intaskcenter = #{intaskcenter,jdbcType=char},
ip_addr = #{ip_addr,jdbcType=varchar},
ip_port = #{ip_port,jdbcType=varchar}
WHERE guid = #{guid}
